answers.description:
The answer to each `Question` attached to the ticket. Format: A hash of answers, keyed by `Question` slug e.g.
`{ "t-shirt-size": "Medium", "skills": ["HTML", "JavaScript"] }`

number.description: Default: Starts at 1 and counts up with each ticket registered. *Readonly*.

reference.description: Default: The order reference plus the index of the ticket in that order e.g. `AXBY-1`. *Readonly*.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags for the ticket.

temporary.description: Is the ticket temporary or not. For example if a ticket needs to be assigned but is not yet confirmed e.g. a payment is pending. Default: `false`. *Readonly*.

test-mode.description: Default: `true` if test mode is enabled for you or for your entire event, otherwise `false`.
